skills.title: Developer
skills.statement: I value clean and efficient code through thoughtful development and vetting. I have lead development for several projects, contributed to open source libraries, and developed enterprise applications.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.statement: I enjoy orchestrating deployments, automating processes, and increasing effeciency. I have experience managing a 100% cloud environment for a zero downtime web application.

skills.title: IT Professional
skills.statement: I am able to understand technology and explain it in easy to understand terms. I have managed servers and workstations in an enterprise environment, configured rolling updates, and maintained compliance to government standards.
